column5: Hey hey all!  Well I know you have heard me rave about the great service I have received in the past with my present insurance company Certas... Turn out they were just bought out my Desjardins... Desjardins is a Visa Broker, Rona Card etc etc etc financial company.... I hate this EVIL Quebec Firm.. Constantly plastered with mailings from them or telemarketing for their financial products.... I truly despise them   So now to find out I will be paying $$ to a company I love to hate I m not happy.  Seeing as how they changed I highly doubt I should be required to pay a break-fee either.. I was not consulted nor asked if I wanted to change insurance companies. I refuse to do business with this firm. They therefor cannot force me to continue with them.   I am now officially in the market for insurance. For my house, two vehicles and boat.  Landlocked, Steve.. have a moment to spare?  Anyone else happy with their rate and the service provided?  Thanks!  G
Give me a call Gerritt. 647.402.2277. I'll see what I can do for you.
Been dealing with State Farm for 30+ years I have always been pleased with the service and support that I have gotten from them.

Gerett  Give Grant.b.Mcallister a call, he is in the business, he is a good guy to deal with professionally and as a friend I would recommend him to anyone..  Here is his number  647.402.2277  good luck  Dave
